contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 30, 1983 D Rochdale Contest (Section A)
Rochdale Contest (Section A) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
rochdale-contest-section-a
None
Rochdale Town Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £200 and trophy, 2nd £150 and shield, 3rd £75 and trophy, 4th £50 and shield. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£25 and trophy) Consett, 2nd Darwen. 12 bands competed.
July 6, 2014, 6:27 a.m. June 27, 2016, 8:32 a.m.
1 Dobcross Silver Band Les Beevers Un Vie de Matelot (A Sailor's Life)
2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson Salute to Youth
3 Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band Alan Lawton Triumphant Rhapsody
4 Blackburn and Darwen Band Gordon Clough Henry the Fifth [Vaughan Williams]
Unknown Result Consett-Whitbread Trophy John Childs Journey into Freedom
Unknown Result Middleton Band Fred Bowker
Unknown Result Stacksteads Brass Band Edward Tarling The Severn Suite
Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band John Durrant
Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Ernest Woodhouse Le Roi d'Ys
